participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and outgoing, Jordan thrives on helping others and forming connections.
participant_1.background: i volunteer in a homeless shelter. i'm a professional wrestler. i like to workout a a times a week. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Curious and a bit quirky, Alex loves exploring new hobbies and expressing themselves through dance.
participant_2.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.

content.text: interesting   i volunteer at a local homeless shelter in my spare time
